parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The number of surveys to return per page. Default is 1000.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: Surveys must be created after this date.

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: Surveys must be created before this date.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of survey to search against.

parameter.name: recipientEmail
parameter.description: Surveys must be sent to this email

parameter.name: isOrderAscending
parameter.description: If 'true' sorts by creation time ASC, if 'false' sorts by creation time DESC. Defaults to 'false'.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Additional fields to return. One or more of :[title, analysis_url, date_created, date_modified, language_id, question_count, num_responses]
